attributes.action: bring in a new law that requires all new buildings/houses must havesolar panels for both heating water and electricity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if all new housing had to have solar panels fitted this would dramatically cut our co2 emissions

it would reduce energy bills for consumers 

create thousands of jobs

this has to be the right thing to do especially for getting us out of these hard economic times

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
